name: MishMash+
description:
One of the most clever and original image puzzle game available!

Using more than one image, MishMash+ is creating a new kind of puzzle. Imagine a puzzle made out of more than 500 pieces on a small device without cluttering the screen display!

MishMash+ is using a clever mechanism to help you progress and solve the puzzle.

Pick a puzzle from a variety of collections or simply create your own using your photos library. New puzzles and collections are added periodically.

MishMash+ is intended for a wide range of users from casual to addict. It is great way to fill your spare time.

Features:

- Solve over 250 puzzles made out of high quality images
- New puzzles are added each week
- Create puzzles with your own photos
- Solve the puzzle of the week
- Solve random puzzle made out of Flickr or 500px popular images
- Share your creation with friends and family
- Pick the puzzle size you prefer
- Optimized for iPhone 5
